short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch map services, and some useful links for OpenStreetMap contributors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Map service switcher

* Open Google map, for example
* You will see a blue earth icon in your Extensions Bar, click it to open Popup Dialog.
* Select OpenStreetMap, for example.
* You will now see OpenStreetMap at the same position in an new Tab.

Settings
* Right click the earth icon and select "Options"
* Check each map to show.
